text: Har Ghar Jal (translation: Water To Every Household) is a scheme initiated by the Government of India in 2019 with the aim to provide tap water to every rural household by 2024. Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman announced the scheme in 2019 union budget. ==References== Category: Water in India Category:Government schemes in India Category:Modi administration initiatives
title: Har ghar jal
